title: NFL ATL: 'Thursday Night Football' preview, 0-2 teams in the hot seat
itunes:title: NFL ATL: 'Thursday Night Football' preview, 0-2 teams in the hot seat
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling give you a Week 3 “Thursday Night Football” preview and break down which 0-2 teams you should be concerned about. “Win Wess’ Toaster” makes a comeback as Wesseling challenges Twitter hopefuls in trivia for his prized NFL toaster. Also, don’t miss producer K. Rich’s much-anticipated theme-music listening party. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL and #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
